name: sip-parser
description: A simple package for parsing and stringifying SIP messages.

scripts.prepare: npm run lint:nofix && npm test && rimraf dist/ && npm run build
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && git push && npm publish && git push origin --tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && git push && npm publish && git push origin --tags
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && git push && npm publish && git push origin --tags

author: Formup
